mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, RTN_DATE AS rtnDate, CONFIRM_DATE AS confirmDate, DEAL_DATE AS dealDate, RTN_AMT AS rtnAmt, CONTENT AS content, CHARGE_CENTER AS chargeCenter, NOTE AS note FROM ATMS_03001230

SELECT TX_ID AS txId, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, RTN_DATE AS rtnDate, CONFIRM_DATE AS confirmDate, DEAL_DATE AS dealDate, RTN_AMT AS rtnAmt, CONTENT AS content, CHARGE_CENTER AS chargeCenter, NOTE AS note FROM ATMS_03001230 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, RTN_DATE = #{rtnDate}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_03001230 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, RTN_DATE = #{rtnDate}

UPDATE ATMS_03001230 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, CONFIRM_DATE = #{confirmDate}, DEAL_DATE = #{dealDate}, RTN_AMT = #{rtnAmt}, CONTENT = #{content}, CHARGE_CENTER = #{chargeCenter}, NOTE = #{note} WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, RTN_DATE = #{rtnDate}

INSERT INTO ATMS_03001230 ( TX_ID, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, RTN_DATE, CONFIRM_DATE, DEAL_DATE, RTN_AMT, CONTENT, CHARGE_CENTER, NOTE ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{rtnDate}, #{confirmDate}, #{dealDate}, #{rtnAmt}, #{content}, #{chargeCenter}, #{note} )
